application.name: skyrange
application.brief: Compute the ra/dec range of a camera image
application.description: This program will report the ra/dec range of a camera image. It will also compute the ra/dec at the center of the cube, the pixel resolution in degrees per pixel, and an orientation angle to celestial north (90 declination) in the image plane. This angle, CelestialNorthClockAngle, is from the center of the image off of the Y-axis (12 o'clock) in a clockwise direction.

history.change: Added computation of CelestialNorthClockAngle and center ra/dec
Fixed appTest to comply to changes in String
Fixed appTest to comply with changes made to all camera model

parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the filename of a cube with camera labels.
